short_summary: Evaluation assessment of Grand Challenges Canada (GCC) programming
description: Contract for evaluation services including management advisory services. Contractor will perform evaluation and recommendations for the Dept. of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development regarding Grand Challenges Canada (GCC) programming. Contractor will provide staff able to communicate in English. Duration: 73 days
full_summary:
# Tender Notice
### Title (Bilingual)

**EVALUATION ASSESSMENT OF THE GRAND CHALLENGES CANADA (GCC) PROGRAMMING**
### Évaluation de la programmation de Grands Défis Canada (GCC)

**Reference Number**

*   cb-761-74099926
### Programming Information

*   **Solicitation Number**: 24-255854
*   **Publication Date**: 2024-02-29
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-03-13T14:00:00
### Tender Details

*   The **Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development Canada** invites bidders to participate in an RFP.
*   **Services to be Provided**: Evaluation of Grand Challenges Canada (GCC) programming.
*   **Contract Type**: Time-based, with expected contract start and end dates of **2024-04-01** and **2024-10-31**.
*   **Work Location**: The majority of the work will take place at the Monitoring Team's offices from their own offices.
### Technical Requirements
We are seeking bidders that meet the specialists requirements below:

*   1 X 2.12 Evaluation Services Consultant / Senior
*   1 X 2.14 Subject Matter Expert in Gender Equality / Intermediate
*   1 X 2.14 Subject Matter Expert in Global Health / Intermediate
*   1 X 2.14 Subject Matter Expert in Development Innovation / Intermediate

Each applicant must provide staff able to communicate for drafting documents in English.

### Instructions to Bidders

If you wish to submit a proposal, please contact:

*   Isabelle Doray, International and Science Communications Division, (343) 551-0084 (telephone) or isabelle.doray@international.gc.ca (email)

To respond to this solicitation, please download the Tender Description and documents from the Canada.ca website or visit the Canadabuys website to submit your proposal.

We require experts who also understand global issues, the evaluation of various global partnerships and familiarity of Evaluation methodologies in multi-unit environments. Best presentations will review relevant skills document submitted with respecting the Technical skill descretion as mentioned below.

### Proposal Submission
